question: Where was Guru Nanak born ?
explanation: Guru Nanak dev was born at Rai Bhoi Ki Talvandi (now Nankana Sahib) near Lahore in April 15, 1469 AD. He was the founder of Sikhism and the reviver of the pure monotheistic doctrine of Upanishads. The verses composed by him were collected in the Adi Granth, written in Gurmukhi script..
